jira.description: Jira MCP Server for issue tracking and sprint management

issues.description: Create, update, and manage Jira issues

jql.description: JQL query support for advanced searches

setup_instructions: 1. Go to Atlassian Account Settings > Security > API tokens
- JIRA_URL: Your Jira instance URL (e.g., https://yourcompany.atlassian.net)
- JIRA_API_TOKEN: The API token you created
4. Add this config to your project's .claude/settings.json under mcpServers
common_operations: Create issue: Creates a new issue in specified project
Update issue: Modify issue fields and transitions
Create sprint: Create new sprints in Scrum boards
Move to sprint: Assign issues to sprints
